name: The Hunt (itch) (ilbini, rubinoffsama, Teddy, Turtle Games Studio)
name_original: The Hunt (itch) (ilbini, rubinoffsama, Teddy, Turtle Games Studio)
description:
You've been selected for a human sacrifice, however, there is an escape.

Find the way out of the ritual and survive.

Controls Move - WASD
Sprint - Shift
Interact - E Enemies Credits Bini - Developer
RubinoffSama - Models & Animations
Teddy - Developer, Sound

We are Turtle Games Studio INC
